page.title: 19Changing Times,Rufforth.
page.content: {Farm land}is being used for{new {houses.}There is{more traffic}passing through the village. There are{no {Racing Stables or Blacksmiths}as there used to be.{Street lighting}was{ {installed}in{1950.}In{1948 piped}water was installed before which{water }was drawn from the village{pump}which has been{preserved. Septic tanks}or{earth {closets emptied}by the{Council}were in common use before{1961}when a{sewer was {laid.Old villagers}say thay were {pleased}the{footpaths}were{provided,} but have{not approved of old houses {being pulled down}or{altered}to look{ {modern.}There used to be{more trees in the{village. Some}were{felled}to make way for the{new school.}The{ {Pinfold,}where{stray animals}were{ {penned up awaiting collection,}can be seen at{the southern}end of the village.
